Texto: 
well developed, well nourished male
raiu =0.5%
tsh= 0.016 uiu/ml
t3 = 234 ng/dl
steroids
discontinue use of amioradone if clinically feasible
global decreased radiotracer uptake of the thyroid gland
amioradone induced chemical thyrotoxicosis
subacute thyroditis
jod-basedow phenomenon
factitious hyperthyroidism
66 year old male with changes in sleeping pattern, heat intolerance and increased appetite treated for cardiac arrythmias with amioradone.
